body:
@goldsborough Intermediate tensors are generated as part of clamp_min's backwards:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5652049/37232285-5f1cd01c-23bc-11e8-866b-161230e98dcc.png)
(In derivatives.yaml).

On the other hand, the current `relu` calls `threshold` which is in THNN (THNN/generic/Threshold.c). It has a custom backward function that does not generate intermediate tensors.

You could alias `relu` in ATen to `at::threshold_forward` or `at::threshold` and I think that would do the job.
